mapper.select: select op.id, oi.inventory_name name, op.purchase_num num, purchase_price price, purchase_total total, oi.inventory_comment comment from od_purchase op inner join od_inventory oi on op.inventory_id = oi.id
mapper.insert: insert into od_purchase(inventory_id, purchase_num, purchase_price, purchase_total, create_time) values(#{inventoryId}, #{purchaseNum}, #{purchasePrice}, #{purchaseTotal}, now())
